articles.title: Bredesen on supporting Kavanaugh: 'It was the right decision'
articles.description: Democratic Tennessee U.S. Senate candidate Phil Bredesen said that he does not regret his decision to support Supreme Court Justice Brett Kavanaugh's confirmation, despite reports of volunteers pulling out because of it.
